page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area is{mainly residential.} Industry is mainly tertiary.Primary and secondary industries are scarce. We have many leisure facilities, schools and organisations.Our lifestyles are typical of people in urban areas in the South of England. Most of us work during the day and look forward to an evening out.On Sundays very few people work,shops, offices and factories are closed. Though some small shops are open for emergency convenience goods. Public transport is very efficient in this area.Bus services are regular, they come about every twenty minutes and there is usually a bus stop within walking distance.We also have train and coach services. The recently constructed Bitterne bypass has brought with it a shopping precinct,a swimming pool,a leisure
